attributes.action: Make care homes & emi units accessible to young dementia sufferers. Under 65
attributes.background: My husband is 59 in late stages of dementia we are struggling to find a placement for him in york as most have to be over 65. This needs addressing as it's only going to get worse. This only adds to the stress when dealing with this devastating disease. More and more young people are being diagnosed

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to make care homes and EMI units more accessible to people under 65.
